product_name: Club Ride Pin It Bike Shorts - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Forget the spandex. The men's Pin It Bike Shorts from Club Ride let you look sharp and pedal in comfort. Lightweight PowerWeave(TM) quick-dry, wicking fabric also offers sun protection. Seamless gusset crotch adds comfort. Zippered side storage pocket. NoCrackBack(TM) covers what you don't want showing. Club Ride Pin It Bike Shorts for men have reflectivity and a 12 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Forget the spandex. The men's Pin It Bike Shorts from Club Ride let you look sharp and pedal in comfort.
